items.summary: Remove/disable all backend authorization enforcement so anonymous callers (unauthenticated principals) have full access to all canister functionality, including creating ponds/posts/ribbits, liking, joining/leaving ponds, username management, profile read/write, view count increments, and admin-only utilities.

Preserve frontend compatibility by keeping existing access-control-related Candid methods present in the backend interface (e.g., initializeAccessControl, getCallerUserRole, assignCallerUserRole, isCallerAdmin), but ensure they do not gate or block any functionality in an anonymous mode.
